title: The same relationship between the same nodes can only exist once
description:
* trying to create the same relationship again 
  * does not negate it (itâ€™s not an on/off switch)
  * does not create a new connection in the database (no duplicates allowed)
* no matter how often the request is triggered, the result will always be the same (idempotency)
  * the ID of the relationship does not change
